subject: RE: Add appId to VisitorTrack - DONE
body:
Fulton,

Done! Added appId to VisitorTrack call in calendar/layout.js:

```javascript
body: JSON.stringify({
  appId: parseInt(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_APPLICATION_ID, 10) || 1,
  visitor_id: visitorId,
  ...
})
```

Deployed as v1.19.20 to DEVL and TEST. Ready for you to update the backend.

- Sarah
